experience: You and Jim both know Christopher Furgis, Aric Zion, and 50 others
The Morrison Team at Launch Real Estate LLC

Substantial positive change is occurring in Phoenix. The movement to embrace re-development and urban infill projects has taken hold all across America. It has been especially strong here in Phoenix. I believe now is the time to take advantage of this momentum—particularly by the people who call these communities home. As an experienced business consultant and licensed real estate agent, I am focused on helping businesses and individuals solve their real estate needs.I am not your normal Business Consultant or Realtor. I provide a high level service to my clients, founded on the principal that everyone should be treated with respect. This, accompanied with my diverse business experience, allows me to find solutions others can’t and help make positive changes in a community I am proud to call home. In this line of business, I am always looking for contacts. I hope to develop partnerships with investors who not only want an attractive return, but also desire to be a part of a positive redevelopment in the greater Phoenix metropolitan area; architects, engineers, and contractors who manage projects with a keen sensitivity to the urban setting of each property; and business entrepreneurs who strive to capitalize on unique community needs. Together, we will collaborate to create successful business initiatives.

•	Created JHM investment Group to provide a broad variety of investment opportunities to private and publicly traded companies and created real estate projects:•	Invested in early internet companies. Served as Chairman of the Board for three years for one of the internet companies, which began as a ISP, grew into a web developer and early transaction facilitator, and today is a leading provider of marketing technology for corporations with distributed marketing networks. Was an early investor and contributor to a company that today provides the most comprehensive encryption, key control and access permission solution to the information security marketplace.•	Started a separate company that bought and developed a large tract of land on the intercostal waterway in Florida. Formed and ran a partnership that acquired a variety of acreage in Johnson County, KS that eventually became a contiguous 500 acre parcel sold as developable asset.•	Participated in investment groups that owned and ran three radio stations, and built and operated multiple restaurant and brewpub establishments. •	Formed and managed private placement groups that invested in small publicly traded companies with dynamic opportunities enabling them to implement significant growth. Structured deals that were attractive for the investors, the companies, and the existing shareholders. Actively consulted management with varied businesses: an international company that began by putting ATM’s in Eastern Europe and became a global provider of electronic payment and transaction processor, a medical device company developing a device to cure a Heart PFO, one that is a leader in developing LED light bulbs, and another that is drilling for natural gas in Poland.
Business Consultant, Real Estate, Business Broker.

Together, we will collaborate to create successful business initiatives.
Senior Vice President, Waddell & Reed Asset Mgmt. Co.

•	Led the Institutional Investment Management arm of Waddell & Reed Inc. a mutual fund company, originally owned by Torchmark Corp.  Responsible for overseeing national sales efforts to the corporate, public, Taft-Hartley, foundation and endowment markets as well as the TPA channels and the consultant community.•	Adapted the company’s mutual fund offerings to individually managed investment services that better suited the institutional investment community. Developed the Institutional sales and marketing approach. Hired and managed all the sales, marketing, service, and clerical staff for the Institutional company. Implemented the compensation structure for the Institutional portfolio managers and sales staff.•	Navigated the complexities as Waddell and Reed Inc. went through the process of an Initial Public Offering (IPO) in 1998.
Director Of Sales, Midwest Region, MetLife Asset Mgmt. Co.

•	Initially hired as regional sales executive responsible for marketing institutional investment management services to plan sponsors and consultants to a four state region. Annually recognized as a lead sales executive for the company.•	Promoted to Director of Sales for the Midwest Region and continued to excel in sales responsibilities. Hired and managed sales people, service and clerical staff.  Responsible for office location, expense management and daily operations.•	Worked directly with senior management in corporate product development, compensation decisions and business direction.

summary: Summary of Qualifications•	Extensive business experience in sales, sales management, financial deal structures and business consulting consistently resulted in increased company profits.•	Successfully achieved greater financial success for companies within multiple industries that faced varied business challenges.  •	Excellent communicator both within all levels of management as well as to customers, prospective clients, and suppliers. •	Experienced Real Estate agent that has help many clients solve complexed real estate needs.
